item.title: Profiling Go: Basics and Practice
item.description: Go has rich profiling tools from the very beginning â€” the pprof package and go tool pprof. Let’s discuss why profiling is useful, how to work with it, and what’s new in this area.

item.title: Principles of slice type in GO
item.description: The Go blog describes how to use slices. Let’s take a look at slice internals.
